productName: MFC-L3735CDN : Network Colour LED All-in-One, Duplex Mobile Print ADF Colour LED Multi-Function Centre with Network Connectivity, Automatic 2-sided Colour Print, ADF -  Multi-page Scan, Copy, Fax, High Productivity with Fast Print Speeds & Multi-tasking, Direct Mobile Print, Low Cost Quality Print Resolution with Affordable Toner
description:
A4 print speed up to 24 ppm (Black/Colour)
AirPrint, Mopria, LAN, USB 2.0
Auto 2-sided (Duplex) printing, 50 sheets Auto-Document Feeder (ADF), 3.7” Colour LCD touchscreen, Security Features, 512 MB Memory, 250 Sheets Paper Tray
Full capacity toner included. Yield up to 1000/1000 pages (black/colour)*
Compatible with Brother iPrint&Scan Mobile App** & BR Admin**
1 Year on-site warranty included
